career_summary: With over 9 years of experience as a Senior Business Analyst, Scrum Master, and Data Analyst, I specialize in software infrastructure, architecture, and administration services for migrating and rebuilding CRM applications.

I currently serve as Senior Business Analyst / Scrum Master at Toffler Associates, leading requirements workshops and documenting comprehensive functional, technical, reporting, and data requirements. I develop and maintain functional models, process flows, and wireframe diagrams to support business and technical processes.

I excel in managing business analysis, testing, and training requirements gathering, including Business Process Reengineering leadership, workflow analysis, gap analysis, user stories, test case development, and functional design.

I have successfully collaborated with CRM and business teams to define reporting requirements and deliver customized Power BI solutions aligned with customer relationship strategies. I optimize Power BI reports for CRM analytics, ensuring real-time updates, data accuracy, and user-friendly visualizations to support decision-making.

I coordinate and support Agile Scrum activities, including sprint planning, daily scrums, task estimation, and retrospectives. I translate business needs into actionable user stories, epics, and detailed specifications that guide micro service development and address backlog items including application defects.

professional_summary.overview: Experienced Senior Business Analyst and Scrum Master with extensive expertise in requirements gathering, business process modeling, and Agile methodologies. Skilled in developing comprehensive documentation and facilitating effective communication between technical and business stakeholders.
highlights: Expertise in software infrastructure, architecture, and administration services for migrating or rebuilding CRM applications
Lead requirements workshops, documenting comprehensive functional, technical, reporting, and data requirements
Develop and document current and future business process flows and utilize analysis and diagramming tools to represent business and technical processes

Manage business analysis, testing, and training requirements gathering, including Business Process Reengineering leadership, workflow analysis, gap analysis, user stories, test case development, and functional design
Collaborate with CRM and business teams to define reporting requirements and deliver customized Power BI solutions that align with customer relationship strategies
Optimize Power BI reports for CRM analytics, ensuring real-time updates, data accuracy, and user-friendly visualizations to support decision-making
Coordinate and support Agile Scrum activities, including sprint planning, daily scrums, task estimation, and retrospectives
Translate business needs into actionable user stories, epics, and detailed specifications that guide micro service development
Develop comprehensive documentation, including design documents, standard operating procedures, system and maintenance documentation, and training materials
Facilitate requirements gathering and planning sessions, collaborating with developers and customers to understand functional and technical requirements
Assist with basic back-end configuration changes and data preparation, working with development teams during the design phase to clarify use cases and requirements
Effectively manage priorities and workload across multiple projects and developers
Experience in screening database files to ensure efficiency of online submission portals and providing error reports using SQL
Skilled in developing and implementing tracking databases to analyze command compliance and clinic processes
Experience in structuring large data files ranging from approximately 10,000-2 million records
Proficient in creating dashboards in JIRA and modifying configurations, utilities, and software default settings for local workstations
Experience in conducting research of legal procedures to ensure procedural compliance of submitted documents
Skilled in streamlining user necessities and providing software modifications accordingly
Experience in improving credentialing workflow of client interface data methods to eliminate waste
Proficient in administering quality review of classified information to manage and organize increasing numbers of documents and data

work_experience.summary: Served as the technical Scrum Master/Business Analyst for IT and Application Development projects related to Cloud, Open Source and/or Mobile application development. Built strong relationships with stakeholders by conducting Agile ceremonies and demonstrated progress reports on system maintenance and issues resolved by the team.
achievements: Served as the technical Scrum Master/Business Analyst for IT and Application Development projects related to Cloud, Open Source and/or Mobile application development
Work closely with the UI/UX SME, Developers, and testers in interpreting the requirement/user stories for their designs, test planning, and test case development based on the client's needs
Build strong relationships with the stakeholders by conducting Daily Stand up, Sprint Planning, Sprint Retrospective, and Sprint Review/Demo on the progress made
Demonstrated progress reports on system maintenance, issues resolved by the team
Recommended information technology strategies, policies, and procedures by evaluating organization outcomes
Organized, managed, and drove the completion of project delivery tasks, assuring proper application of project management standards, tools and methodologies and deliverables
Agile Events / Ceremonies - effectively managed and facilitated Agile ceremonies to support development and product releases
Scheduling, managing and coordinating release for .NET applications within various portfolios
Constructing a release calendar for the different projects to have a centralized view of all releases
Manage and mitigate risks and resolve issues regarding release quality and schedule
work_experience.environment: Cloud, Open Source, Mobile applications, .NET applications, Agile methodologies, Scrum ceremonies

work_experience.summary: Business Analyst for the Long-Term Support and Services system (LTSS) on Medicaid and Medicare functionality for the state of Maryland. Planned and prioritized product feature backlog and development for LTSS, defined product vision, roadmap and PI Planning execution plan, and provided backlog management, iteration planning, and elaboration of user stories.
achievements: Business Analyst for the Long-Term Support and Services system (LTSS) on Medicaid and Medicare functionality for the state of Maryland
Plan and prioritize product feature backlog and development for LTSS
Define product vision, roadmap and PI Planning execution plan
Provide backlog management, iteration planning, and elaboration of the user stories
Work closely with Product Management to create and maintain a product backlog according to business value or ROI
Lead meeting with end users to understand needs, and design solutions accounting for value on the Joint Patient Assessment and Tracking System (JPATS) 2.0
Develop test plans and user guides for the system's release
Assist in developing an initial set of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) that are quantitative and qualitative benchmarks using client provided metrics
Participate in meetings with client to review work progress, specific deliverables, performance evaluation and quality improvement activities, and future plans
Reporting bugs as they are discovered and working closely with developers and testers to ensure a fix deployment
Provide support for the initial configuration and parameters of equipment for system credibility and resolve problems to the end user's satisfaction
Perform testing, troubleshooting, and analysis on the development of LTSS software
Serve as a Subject Matter Expert driving and defining the launch of new features, services, and functionality for the main product lines for LTSS
Develop and maintain Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for the project using the State of Work (SOW)
Conduct trainings ranging from groups of 25 individuals to summits of 5,000 individuals
Create and maintain reporting templates and class presentations via PowerPoint with animations, diagrams, etc
Create Provider Portal webinars for LTSS Maryland Department of Health and the training modules for the users by using the SOP
Assist in the creation of E-learning modules for training including Camtasia and Snagit (screenshots, verbiage, etc.)
work_experience.environment: LTSS platform (4 major subsystems: DDA, MDC, Provider Portal, REMS), JPATS, Medicaid, Medicare, Maryland Department of Health
